statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={168.8}{e}^{{{0.0245}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0245}}\approx{1.0248025911072}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0248025911072}-{1}={0.024802591107199}\approx{0.0248} and the percent is 2.48.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
